abstract: Excerpts from conversation with actor Sterling K Brown, in which he discusses portrayal of prosecutor Christopher Darden on FX television series The People v OJ Simpson: American Crime Story.

headline.content_kicker: A Word With: Sterling K. Brown
headline.main: The Breakout Star of ‘The People v. O.J. Simpson’ on the Emotional Finale

keywords.value: The People v OJ Simpson: American Crime Story (TV Program)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: In Mr. Darden, one of the prosecutors in “The People v. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story,” Mr. Brown has had a breakout role.
lead_paragraph: In Mr. Darden, one of the prosecutors in “The People v. O.J. Simpson: American Crime Story,” Mr. Brown has had a breakout role.
